about_the_game:
Welcome to the chaotic world of Letter Lancers, where mail delivery meets mayhem in thrilling local co-op action! Gather your crew and dive into a pulse-pounding adventure where every letter delivered is a victory earned. Battle relentless waves of enemies, navigate treacherous dungeons, and dodge a storm of bullets—all while ensuring every package gets to its destination. It's not just delivery; it's survival with style!

  • Local co-op up to 4 players. Get some buddies together in person or invite your Steam friends to play with via Steam's Steam Remote.

  • Stay in the action! Reviving team members made easy, keeping all players in the game without too much down time between deaths.

  • Disclaimer: Controllers are required to play local multiplayer.

  • 1 of multiple game modes -- The standard way the game was meant to be played.

  • Dungeon crawl through procedurally generated rooms, kill all enemies, level up, and get that sweet, SWEET, loot!

  • Struggling with your run and need a boost? We got you. Get rewarded at the end of each run, even if you fail. Rewards can unlock meta progression upgrades to make your runs easier. You got this buddy.

  • A different game mode featuring it's own 24 hour leaderboards. Top daily scores are posted in the Letter Lancers discord server.

  • A procedurally generated ruleset our servers generate that changes the gameplay experience everyday, adding different gameplay modifiers, allowing for only certain characters to be used, mixes up enemies spawned, and ether increases the player's power scaling fantasy, or gives you a reallllll hard time. How far will you make it?

  • Disclaimer: An active internet connection is required to play the Daily Challenge mode. (You can still play other modes without an internet connection)

  • Fight rooms have a time limit to them, with infinite enemy spawns until the timer is up.

  • Survive for the duration to proceed to the next room.

  • 1 larger map offering a higher enemy density and increased intensity.

  • Experience needs to be picked up in this mode.

  • Survive for 30 minutes. "OHHHH REAL ORIGINAL MISTER DESIGNER!"

  • Multiple layers of meta progression to help you on your runs, and keeping you coming back for more!

  • Use gem currency (awarded by playing) to upgrade 40+ skills to all your characters permanently.

  • The more you kill with an ability, weapon and character, the more experience they'll get. Each having 50 levels, permanently making them stronger!

  • Compete in leaderboards specific to level, amount of players, and game mode.

  • Standard, Time Attack, and Survivor modes leaderboards' are reset with every major update.

  • Daily leaderboards reset every 24 hours, and top scores are posted and immortalized in the Letter Lancers discord.

  • Disclaimer: An active internet connection is required to post your leaderboard scores. (You can still play without an internet connection)

  • Create different builds from hundreds of modifiers.

  • 80+ weapons and abilities.

  • 30+ playable characters.

  • 40+ meta progression upgrades to help you on your runs.

  • 50 levels for every ability, weapon, and character.

  • 4 different game modes, 1 of which offers players a different experience every single day.
detailed_description:
Welcome to the chaotic world of Letter Lancers, where mail delivery meets mayhem in thrilling local co-op action! Gather your crew and dive into a pulse-pounding adventure where every letter delivered is a victory earned. Battle relentless waves of enemies, navigate treacherous dungeons, and dodge a storm of bullets—all while ensuring every package gets to its destination. It's not just delivery; it's survival with style!

  • Local co-op up to 4 players. Get some buddies together in person or invite your Steam friends to play with via Steam's Steam Remote.

  • Stay in the action! Reviving team members made easy, keeping all players in the game without too much down time between deaths.

  • Disclaimer: Controllers are required to play local multiplayer.

  • 1 of multiple game modes -- The standard way the game was meant to be played.

  • Dungeon crawl through procedurally generated rooms, kill all enemies, level up, and get that sweet, SWEET, loot!

  • Struggling with your run and need a boost? We got you. Get rewarded at the end of each run, even if you fail. Rewards can unlock meta progression upgrades to make your runs easier. You got this buddy.

  • A different game mode featuring it's own 24 hour leaderboards. Top daily scores are posted in the Letter Lancers discord server.

  • A procedurally generated ruleset our servers generate that changes the gameplay experience everyday, adding different gameplay modifiers, allowing for only certain characters to be used, mixes up enemies spawned, and ether increases the player's power scaling fantasy, or gives you a reallllll hard time. How far will you make it?

  • Disclaimer: An active internet connection is required to play the Daily Challenge mode. (You can still play other modes without an internet connection)

  • Fight rooms have a time limit to them, with infinite enemy spawns until the timer is up.

  • Survive for the duration to proceed to the next room.

  • 1 larger map offering a higher enemy density and increased intensity.

  • Experience needs to be picked up in this mode.

  • Survive for 30 minutes. "OHHHH REAL ORIGINAL MISTER DESIGNER!"

  • Multiple layers of meta progression to help you on your runs, and keeping you coming back for more!

  • Use gem currency (awarded by playing) to upgrade 40+ skills to all your characters permanently.

  • The more you kill with an ability, weapon and character, the more experience they'll get. Each having 50 levels, permanently making them stronger!

  • Compete in leaderboards specific to level, amount of players, and game mode.

  • Standard, Time Attack, and Survivor modes leaderboards' are reset with every major update.

  • Daily leaderboards reset every 24 hours, and top scores are posted and immortalized in the Letter Lancers discord.

  • Disclaimer: An active internet connection is required to post your leaderboard scores. (You can still play without an internet connection)

  • Create different builds from hundreds of modifiers.

  • 80+ weapons and abilities.

  • 30+ playable characters.

  • 40+ meta progression upgrades to help you on your runs.

  • 50 levels for every ability, weapon, and character.

  • 4 different game modes, 1 of which offers players a different experience every single day.
name: Letter Lancers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 3.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 3.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A 4-player couch co-op rogue-lite bullet-hell that will have you and your friends laughing your way through epic battles! Grab your friends, pick your characters, and get ready to ruin someone's day! Level up, select from hundreds of modifiers, get loot, and earn your place on the leaderboards!
supported_languages: English, Italian, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Indonesian
